sentences.en: Can you hooray with all your might?
sentences.cn: 你能竭力高呼万岁 吗 ?

sentences.en: Even by the standards of hooray analyst coverage, this was extreme.
sentences.cn: 即使是对比拉拉队分析师的分析, 这也太过了.

sentences.en: Hooray ! Hooray ! Let's all go play.
sentences.cn: ( 欢呼声 )让我们一起去玩吧.

sentences.en: Hooray ! You did it. That's my boy. You'll be a trumpet player when you get older.
sentences.cn: 好哇,你办到 啦, 不愧是我的孩子. 你再大一点就可以去吹喇叭了.

sentences.en: Hooray for the fun! Is the pudding done?
sentences.cn: 为我们的奶奶欢呼! 她是不是在做布丁 呢 ?
万岁, 我们现在安全了!

sentences.en: Hooray! It's the last day of school.
sentences.cn: 万岁! 这是本学期在学校的最后一天了.

sentences.en: Hooray! We made two more points. We might win this game after all.
sentences.cn: 嘿! 我们又得了两分. 我们最终可能赢得比赛.

sentences.en: If that worked, hooray! If not, soldier on to the next step.
sentences.cn: 如果这样行得通，万岁！如果还不行，那就迎着困难进行下一步吧
下雪了! 飞舞的 雪花 给你带来冬天的问候!

sentences.en: Oh, we love holidays, holidays, hooray!
sentences.cn: 哦, 我们喜欢假期, 假期, 万岁!

sentences.en: Some people have referred to documentaries like Blue Planet and Planet Earth as 'wildlife porn' – and I'd say hooray to that if it inspires viewers to get out into the natural world.
sentences.cn: 有些人把《蓝色星球》和《行星地球》这样的纪录片称之为‘野生生命情色片’——如果它们能激发观众亲近自然，那我会为这样的情色高呼万岁。

sentences.en: Three cheers for China! hip , hip, hooray ! hip , hip , hooray hooray!
sentences.cn: 为中国队欢呼! 啦啦啦!啦啦啦! 啦啦啦!

sentences.en: Three cheers for the winner — hip, hip, hooray!
sentences.cn: 为胜利者欢呼三声——嗨, 嗨, 万岁!

trans.tran_cn: （表示快乐或赞同）好极了，好哇
